nodes.documentation:
@title SafeMath
@dev Math operations with safety checks that throw on error
nodes.name: SafeMath

nodes.documentation: @dev Multiplies two numbers, throws on overflow.
nodes.name: mul

nodes.documentation: @dev Integer division of two numbers, truncating the quotient.
nodes.name: div

nodes.documentation: @dev Substracts two numbers, throws on overflow (i.e. if subtrahend is greater than minuend).
nodes.name: sub

nodes.documentation: @dev Adds two numbers, throws on overflow.
nodes.name: add
Ownable

nodes.documentation:
@dev The Ownable constructor sets the original `owner` of the contract to the sender
account.
nodes.name: Ownable

nodes.documentation: @dev Throws if called by any account other than the owner.
nodes.name: onlyOwner

nodes.documentation:
@dev Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.
@param newOwner The address to transfer ownership to.
nodes.name: transferContractOwnership
Claimable

nodes.documentation: @dev Modifier throws if called by any account other than the pendingOwner.
nodes.name: onlyPendingOwner

nodes.documentation:
@dev Allows the current owner to set the pendingOwner address.
@param newOwner The address to transfer ownership to.
nodes.name: transferOwnership

nodes.documentation: @dev Allows the pendingOwner address to finalize the transfer.
nodes.name: claimOwnership
CanReclaimToken

nodes.documentation:
@dev Reclaim all ERC20Basic compatible tokens
@param token ERC20Basic The address of the token contract
nodes.name: reclaimToken
Contactable

nodes.documentation:
@dev Allows the owner to set a string with their contact information.
@param info The contact information to attach to the contract.
nodes.name: setContactInformation
HasNoContracts

nodes.documentation:
@dev Reclaim ownership of Ownable contracts
@param contractAddr The address of the Ownable to be reclaimed.
nodes.name: reclaimContract
HasNoTokens
tokenFallback

nodes.documentation:
@title Destructible
@dev Base contract that can be destroyed by owner. All funds in contract will be sent to the owner.
nodes.name: Destructible

nodes.documentation: @dev Transfers the current balance to the owner and terminates the contract.
nodes.name: destroy

nodes.documentation:
@title Pausable
@dev Base contract which allows children to implement an emergency stop mechanism.
nodes.name: Pausable

nodes.documentation: @dev Modifier to make a function callable only when the contract is not paused.
nodes.name: whenNotPaused

nodes.documentation: @dev Modifier to make a function callable only when the contract is paused.
nodes.name: whenPaused

nodes.documentation: @dev called by the owner to pause, triggers stopped state
nodes.name: pause

nodes.documentation: @dev called by the owner to unpause, returns to normal state
nodes.name: unpause
SafeERC20

nodes.documentation:
@title Basic token
@dev Basic version of StandardToken, with no allowances.
nodes.name: BasicToken

nodes.documentation: @dev total number of tokens in existence
nodes.name: totalSupply
transfer
balanceOf
StandardToken
transferFrom
approve
allowance
increaseApproval
decreaseApproval
